description: Premium Nicaraguan cigar celebrating Padron's 30th anniversary (1994). Box-pressed with exceptional craftsmanship. Available in Natural and Maduro wrappers. Cigar of the Year 2021 (97 points).
tasting_notes: dark chocolate, espresso, cocoa, black pepper, earth, licorice

description: Infused cigar line with unique aromatic blends. Sweet and flavorful with botanical infusions. Popular entry-level cigar for those new to premium cigars.
best_for: New smokers, flavored cigar fans, casual occasions

description: Classic Dominican cigar from legendary Fuente family. Smooth and refined with Cameroon or Maduro wrappers. Consistent quality since 1912.
tasting_notes: cedar, nuts, cream, mild spice, leather

description: Entry-level Padron offering exceptional value. All Nicaraguan tobaccos with natural or maduro wrappers. Hand-crafted with no shortcuts.
Dominican cigar with Connecticut Shade wrapper. Smooth and creamy with mild to medium body. Great morning or afternoon smoke.
tasting_notes: cream, cedar, coffee, nuts, subtle spice

description: Legendary ultra-premium Dominican puro with rare Fuente-grown wrapper. Introduced in 1995 as one of the world's finest cigars with limited production. Full-bodied with exceptional complexity and construction. Consistently rated 90+ points by Cigar Aficionado.
tasting_notes: leather, espresso, black pepper, cinnamon, spice, earth, cocoa, almond

description: Prestigious box-pressed Nicaraguan cigar commemorating José O. Padron's 75th birthday. Made from tobacco aged five years for exceptional smoothness. Available in sun-grown Natural and rich Maduro wrappers. Individually numbered to prevent counterfeiting. Consistently rated 90-96 points.
tasting_notes: chocolate, espresso, coffee, earth, leather, cocoa, cedar, malt
best_for: Experienced smokers, special occasions, cigar aficionados

description: Iconic Nicaraguan powerhouse and one of the most popular full-bodied cigars. Ranked #4 Cigar of the Year 2014 by Cigar Aficionado. Ligero-heavy blend with sun-grown Habano wrapper delivers consistent quality and bold flavors. Premium construction with even burn.
tasting_notes: cinnamon, baked apple, nuts, raisins, coffee, oak, spice, walnut, espresso
best_for: Experienced smokers seeking bold flavors, evening smoke

description: Ultra-premium boutique cigar from Drew Estate's prestigious Liga Privada series. Connecticut Broadleaf wrapper with complex Honduran and Nicaraguan fillers. Full-bodied with meticulous construction and cult following among enthusiasts. Consistently rated 89-91 points.
tasting_notes: white pepper, cocoa, earth, oak, leather, raisins, hickory, herbal notes
best_for: Experienced smokers, special occasions, full-bodied cigar fans

description: Cigar Aficionado's 2015 Cigar of the Year with prestigious 97-point rating. Box-pressed premium cigar by master blender José Pepin Garcia. Full-bodied Nicaraguan puro with Habano Rosado wrapper. Exceptional construction with complex evolution throughout the smoke.
tasting_notes: black pepper, oak, chocolate, coffee, pecans, earth, cream
best_for: Special occasions, experienced smokers, cigar collectors
